events.name: The Fallen Titan
events.description: You stand in the shadow of the Fallen Titan, a pine tree so ancient and impossibly large that its fall centuries ago reshaped this part of the forest. Its colossal trunk, wider than a house, lies across the landscape, now covered in a thick blanket of moss and sprouting fungi the size of shields. The massive, upturned root ball is a wall of earth and stone, and the hollowed sections of its trunk are large enough to serve as caves, home to all manner of creatures.
